combinationSkills.name: Magic Spell
combinationSkills.description: [Foes] Non-Elem. M.Attack activates aft.S.A Combos by 2+ Ascension-unlocked Units w/same Comb. Attack. ※ Can be Units of same character.

combinationSkills.name: Top Familia Executives
combinationSkills.description: [Foes] Non-Elem. P.Attack activates aft. S.A Combos by 2+ Ascension upgraded(x3+) Units w/same Comb. Attack. ※ Cannot be Units of same character.

combatSkills.name: Dancing Lil Rafaga
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Ultra Water M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost & 50% Sleep

combatSkills.name: Ravage Dance
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Super Water M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost & Ultra Penetration Rate

combatSkills.name: Kaleidoscopic Dance
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Remove increase in Dmg. received (All Targets) & P.Resist Debuff exc. Assist Skill

combatSkills.name: Alluring Steps
combatSkills.description: [Allies] 25% HP Regen & P.Resist and Heal+25%/5 turns

passiveSkills.name: Agitation
passiveSkills.description: When countering, instead of attacking regularly, 75% Taunt a Foe.
